Small ____ include ____, ____, ____ fox, longtail ____, ____, ____ otter, black-footed ____, ____ striped ____. Rodents are numerous, such as the black-tailed prairie dog,white-tailed jack rabbit, snowshoe hare, Richardson's ground squirrel, Franklin's ground squirrel, thirteen-lined ground squirrel, least chipmunk, northern pocket gopher, olive-backed pocket mouse, Ord's kangaroo rat, white-footed mouse and beaver.

Small carni_____ include coy___, bad___, r__ fox, longtail wea___, mi__, ri___ otter, black-footed fer___, a__ striped sk___. Rodents are numerous, such as the black-tailed prairie dog,white-tailed jack rabbit, snowshoe hare, Richardson's ground squirrel, Franklin's ground squirrel, thirteen-lined ground squirrel, least chipmunk, northern pocket gopher, olive-backed pocket mouse, Ord's kangaroo rat, white-footed mouse and beaver.
data.fullContent: Large herbivores include whitetail deer (a recent invader), mule deer, pronghorn antelope, elk, and moose. Small carnivores include coyote, badger, red fox, longtail weasel, mink, river otter, black-footed ferret, and striped skunk. Rodents are numerous, such as the black-tailed prairie dog,white-tailed jack rabbit, snowshoe hare, Richardson's ground squirrel, Franklin's ground squirrel, thirteen-lined ground squirrel, least chipmunk, northern pocket gopher, olive-backed pocket mouse, Ord's kangaroo rat, white-footed mouse and beaver.
data.answer: 大型食草动物包括白尾鹿(最近的入侵者)，骡鹿，叉角羚，麋鹿和驼鹿。小型食肉动物包括郊狼、獾、赤狐、长尾鼬、貂、河獭、黑足雪貂和条纹鼬。啮齿动物种类繁多，如黑尾草原土拨鼠、白尾家兔、雪兔、理查森地松鼠、富兰克林地松鼠、十三层地松鼠、最小的花栗鼠、北方口袋地鼠、橄榄背口袋鼠、奥德的袋鼠鼠、白足鼠和海狸。
